name: Bucket Boss Canvas SuperWaist Work Apron in Brown, 80100
short_description: Canvas Heavy-duty canvas construction 13 pockets 2 web hammer loops Adjustable belt with quick-release buckle Fits up to 52" waist
product_description: Be prepared for all of your jobs with the thirteen pockets and two hammer loops on this Super Waist Apron. Made of heavy-duty Duck wear canvas, the Super Waist Apron is designed to last under everyday use. This handy shop accessory will become a must-wear while you work. The larger pockets fit tape measures, nails, screws, and more while smaller pockets are ideal for rules, pencils, screwdrivers and other hand tools. Features a quick release belt closure lets you transition from shop to home in seconds. The one size fits most design accommodates waist sizes up to 52".

name: Dickies 2-Pocket Canvas Work Waist Apron, Suitable for Woodworkers, Artists, and other Craftspeople, Black
short_description: DURABLE CANVAS - Constructed of heavy-duty rip-resistant canvas REINFORCED - Stitching-reinforced corners and stress points CONVENIENT STORAGE - Great for holding small tools, utility knives, pencils and other small loose items DIMENSIONS - Each pocket measures 9-inches wide x 5-inches deep CUSTOMIZABLE FIT - Tie strings are designed to fit waists up to 56-inches 1 YEAR WARRANTY - Comes with a 1 year limited warranty
product_description: Who said aprons had to stay in the kitchen? Whether you’re on the job site or working in the garage, the Dickies Work Gear 57078 2-Pocket Canvas Apron should be an essential part of your everyday work wear. This lightweight apron features two large pockets with stitching-reinforced corners that are great for holding small tools, utility knives, pencils and other small loose items. Constructed of smooth, durable black canvas, this apron will last in any environment and it easily ties around your waist, letting you customize your fit. With its compact design, you can either hang it up when you’re done or fold it in half for easy storage. Each pocket measures: 9-inches wide x 5-inches deep. Designed with functionality in mind, every Dickies Tool Bag is crafted of heavy-duty materials and equipped with features to help you work smarter. Each bag, pouch, belt, or rig is built to last. With reinforced pockets and tool loops, durable webbed straps, and an assortment of pockets to store every tool in the garage, these tough bags are meant to hold up to the harshest of environments. Whether you're a painter, carpenter, builder or weekend warrior, there's a Dickies Tool Bag out there made to keep you at the top of your game.
